Introduction

Shin Soo Hyun is a South Korean singer and actor. He is best known as a member of the South Korean boy group, U-KISS under NH Media.

On April 15, 2021, Soohyun announced that his contract with NH Media had expired after 10 years. He revealed that his name as U-KISS's Soohyun has not changed.
